LanguageData.USAC_Faction.label: United Stellar Armament Company
LanguageData.USAC_Faction.description: A group of resource development companies and armed trading groups driven by profit, originating from a planet that was enlightend by colonization and gained abilities to reach interstellar, countless massive corporations have created this man-eating Leviathan through military hegemony and commercial mergers and acquisitions on their home planet. Their purpose on this world is to gain a foothold and prepare for a total ground control.
